channel.title: ::Ticket Command Desired
channel.description: Hello, I just wanted to do a command for help, If a player needs help and wants to speak to a moderator I want there to be a ::Ticket ( Like there is in CX source ) I've made the ::Ticket command but am still a little confused on how to work this better.

item.title: ::Ticket Command Desired
item.dc:creator: @Danny_Roggia Danny Roggia
item.description:
@Danny_Roggia wrote:

Thanks!! I’ve completed this command!

Read full topic

item.title: ::Ticket Command Desired
item.dc:creator: @Wank Broham
item.description:
@Wank wrote:

You’d need to declare a method, and do a few other things for something to work well like this but you can always do it like

if (playerCommand.startsWith("help")) { String ticketQ = playerCommand.substring(5); if (ticketInfo.length() > 20) { c.sendMessage(""); return; } } c.tickets.processTicket(ticketQ, true, true, true); }

Read full topic
